import '../CSS/Live.css' import Questions from '../data/TCSNQT1.js' import React, { useState } from 'react' function Live() { const Questionslist=Questions[0].QA; const [count,setCount]=useState(1) return(

verbal

Reasoning

{/*

Q1. lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing

  1. apple
  2. apple
  3. apple
  4. apple
*/} {Questionslist.map((question)=>{ if(count==1) return ( <>

Q{question.No}.

{question.Q}

  1. {question.options[0]}
  2. {question.options[1]}
  3. {question.options[2]}
  4. {question.options[3]}
) }) }
) } export default Live;
